text: Nine fishermen of Pudukottai district were arrested by the Sri Lankan naval personnel on Saturday night on a charge of having trespassed beyond the International Maritime Boundary Line. According to official sources, the fishermen ventured into sea from Jagadapattinam and Kottaipattinam on Saturday morning, shortly after recalling the indefinite strike in support of their demand for releasing the fishermen arrested earlier by the Sri Lankan naval personnel. They seized their two boats.
title: Nine fishermen held
